meta.title: Configure dev branch defaults and protections
meta.summary: Set dev as default branch and enforce minimum protections so all feature work routes through PRs.

task.objective: Set `dev` as default branch and enforce PR-based integration into `dev`.
constraints: Keep protections lighter than `prod` but still PR-gated.
Do not bypass existing required checks.

steps.instruction: Open repository branch settings and set the default branch to `dev`.
Add branch protection for `dev` requiring pull requests before merge.
Enable conversation resolution requirement for merges into `dev`.
Configure current required status checks for `dev` merges; if `lint` and `typecheck` checks do not yet exist, record deferred enforcement for completion after `TASK_09` and `TASK_11`.
Capture non-secret verification output showing `dev` as default branch and associated protections, and record in `docs/DEPLOYMENT_INFRA_EVIDENCE.md`.
In `docs/DEPLOYMENT_INFRA_STATUS.md`, mark `TASK_03` as completed and record the applied settings and UTC timestamp.

stop_conditions: Stop and ask operator if default branch change is blocked by organization policy.
